comment: Professor Banks is an amazing teacher. She really cares about her students and takes the time to remember everyone's topic so she can bring it up in class and talk about ways to improve the essays. There were 3 papers and 1 extra credit media project throughout the semester. Easy if you attend class. She's very in tune with the newer generation.

I have had her for two English classes and she was great both times. She does take a while to grade but she is an easy grader. As long as you put in the effort and talk to her about any troubles she is pretty lenient. She is a very caring person and takes time out to understand her students. Overall definitely recommend professor pumpkin!
i love professor pumpkin! her only downfall is she takes forever to grade but shes not a hard grader. She's so sweet and takes time to connect with her students. Has to be one of the best at Ksaw
rating_tags: Respected--Accessible outside class--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Banks is by far one of my favorite professors. There were 3 papers in total and a media project that you could do for extra credit. She is a very fair grader and gives good feedback. There were no quizzes but there was weekly discussion posts. She is a very slow grader. I did not know my essay grades until finals week. Overall she's great

Professor Banks is one of the nicest and most caring teachers I have every had. She is a very generous grader and gives you multiple chances to turn in assignments!! Only reason I got a B is because I could have tried more. If you put in effort you are sure to pass with an A, easily! Take Her!!! Grades may take a minute but if you ask she'll tell
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Participation matters--Graded by few things

comment: She is such an amazing professor. She is very understanding and really helps you develop your papers. I had three papers, a couple of homework assignments, and an opportunity for extra credit. The only downside is grading may take a while but if your fine with that TAKE THIS PROFESSOR. You will not regret it. She is definitely the best.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Im not sure if it was just due to the weirdness of covid, but Professor Banks had an absolutely preposterous grade turn around time. I didnt get my first grade back until sometime in mid-November. Seems to be an easy grader, though. Her lectures got off track a lot. No final. Four papers and about 3-4 other grades of side quests.

Probably the best teacher I had so far. Her lectures are entertaining and her teachings is sharp. If you need anything, she is always available a message away and responds in a timely manner. We have three main papers and a few other smaller 250-300 word activities. If she is available, GET HER
rating_tags: Amazing lectures--Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment: I wish all my professors were like Professor Banks/Pumpkin. She is so sweet and makes every class fun to attend. She is also young and relates to her students well. Show up to class and get involved and you should not have a hard time passing or even getting a B or A.

I AM LITERALLY TAKING ANOTHER CLASS FROM HER BECAUSE I LOVE HER SO MUCH. Granted, I am taking an online course of hers and she uses discord, she is so funny and open, she loves interacting with students, and she is overall an amazing person. She takes a while to grade but she is genuinely an amazing teacher. Please take her.

Professor Banks is so sweet! She's kind and understanding of everyone, and her class feels more like a chat than a lecture. The PowerPoints she uses are extremely helpful. She even gives you something called an "extra life", where you get one opportunity to turn in a paper a day late. She won't penalize you that one time, no questions asked.

I love Professor Banks as a person, but she takes forever grade. We are half way through the semester and I don't have a single grade in. It doesn't help for her to go through individually and give us notes if we can't use those notes by the next paper. Fun class but probably wont take her again just because I don't even know my current grade;.

Very easy class. There is some participation required and the work was really easy. The lowest graded paper can be rewritten for full credit. This was a huge saver (I had misread the rubric and was a page short on a paper) because it allowed me to get an A in the class. One downside was that grades took forever, but it was probably due to COVID-19.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Banks is new, young, and super sweet. Four papers and one media project are required, as well as leading class discussion one day. I'm a good writer, so I found the class to be fairly easy. All papers require research. Very fair grader and gives feedback that helps on the next assignment. Only allowed to skip 2x.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: She does take some time to grade stuff, but honestly, she's pretty clear on how she'll grade stuff. Go to class, participate, write your paper, and you will be fine! She's willing to help outside of class too!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Group projects--Clear grading criteria

comment: Prof Banks is an angel if you're worried about English in college. Never been good at essays and made A's on all of them, attendance is required but you barely learn or have to participate except for one group led discussion. Class is based on video games and movies but she gives you a lot of freedom on what to write about.

Professor Banks is an amazing professor. She genuinely cares about her students success, and is always willing to help where it's needed. She offers plenty of extra credit in different areas, and her assignment guidelines are always clear. 10/10 would recommend.

Professor banks was awesome wasnt a hard grader and the assignments were easy and to the point. This class was game based. The only problem i had with her was that she took forever to grade your papers and i didn't know what i got on my last two papers until finals week

I truly recommend her to every person I can! I absolutely adore her! She inspired me to actually enjoy writing when I hated it before college. Professor Banks is a truly wonderful teacher and is laid back. She was my only class on Monday and Wednesday but I still showed up because she was worth it (especially at 0905)! You won't regret having her!!

This was one of my favorite classes that I had taken so far. She's really laid back and made the class really easy to understand. Her lectures are teamed around holidays, sports and video games. She was a really fun professor and one of the extra credit opportunity was that if you dressed up for Halloween she gave you a couple of points for it.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: I am so glad that I took her class this semester. I usually don't rate any professor because I am really lazy but she inspired me!!! Ms. Banks helps students a lot and she is very funny. If you don't take her lecture, you will regret it. She gives bonus point opportunities, easy assignments, and a nice project. All students received A on projects.
Very fun and entertaining class. Great personality and made the class very fun! 3 major essays and a multi media project.

We had three papers & one project which was easy. You can skip 6 times after that you fail the class. She gives good feedback but it isnt that helpful because she takes forever to grade. She gave us an opportunity to revise one of our papers but we didnt get our grades for two of the papers until after the semester was over so we couldnt revise.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Graded by few things--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Great teacher! She gives many opportunities for people to pass the class and is very understanding and willing to work with students if there are issues with assignments.

Fantastic teacher! Her interest in video games is practically a part of this class, excellent powerpoints. Get two books, one you will definitely need for citations and other is for the course. Discussions and questions very important. The essays are considered to be test than actual multiple choice test (she does not believe in them) So great!!

TAKE THIS CLASS!!. Everything is video game and sports based. Only homework is the discussion you have to lead with someone else in class. You read from the textbook and talk about what you read in class super easy. Kinda a harsh grader but she knows what she's talking about and will help with your essay and give feedback if you ask her for help!!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Graded by few things

comment: Love going to her class although it not a lot of work . Perfect . The topic of the class is easy and fun. Perfect professor
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Banks is very understanding and outgoing and might have been the easiest English class I have taken. You are only graded on a couple of papers and a final project so it is important that you do well on the graded assignments and you have to lead a discussion over a reading in the book once, but it is not bad at all.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: Miss banks is so sweet! She's quirky and adorable but also knows what she's talking about. She's a little slow with grading but I think it should be better when she finishes her masters which is super soon. Take her if you can! Attendance is mandatory but you get to miss 6 classes without penalty (I'm pretty sure)
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: Ms. Banks is a very good professor! She is so kind and doesn't grade your papers too harshly. Most of my ENGL 1101 class with her was video game based which made it more interesting. She has 4 or 5 papers during the semester and the final is just a simple project. TAKE THIS CLASS WITH BANKS!

Banks is very caring and understanding. You're supposed to use "everything is an argument" based on a schedule. I didn't read it and still did really well. Her course is based on video games and sports, which is pretty cool. However, there is a blog post for every paper that doesn't help because you don't get the grades back in time anyways.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: If you don't like public speaking probably not the prof for you. Other than that my favorite professor so far! Kinda boring lectures and powerpoints but only have 3 papers. You have to talk about a reading in front of the class once, so keep that in mind. Awesome teacher!! Everyone should take her.

She is very sweet and understanding. Her papers are relatively easy and she gives great feedback. Also gives 2 extra credit points for going to writing center. Do have to read the readings for the day to be able to get your participation grade on the in class work. Everyone has to lead the discussion over the reading once for a grade.

Shes a super young teacher and you can tell shes still trying to figure everything out. Her papers are pretty easy but she grades a little tougher than my previous professors. You have to discuss a reading in front of the class once in the semester but its not hard. Shes very sweet and is willing to work with you on anything.

Professor Banks is an amazing professor. She always makes herself available, and she also gives great feedback in papers. She does not grade harshly. Her assignments are also straightforward. Essays are the main grades in the class. The class is definitely an easy A!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Professor Banks is the sweetest and most caring person. She truly cares about her students and is willing to work with you. All of the assignments are very easy!! Easy A if you just try! 10/10 recommend. TAKE HER!!

I have never been a someone who has really liked or has been very good at literature. This semester with Ms. Banks has been one of my best experiences with a lit class. Highly recommend taking this class if you want to have a great teacher with not a super heavy workload. Overall great professor.

She's very nice and super caring. She has an over all of 3 papers, 1 project, 1 presentation, and a few blog post. All of the assignments are fairly easy. She gives us enough time in and out of class to do our assignments. She has plenty of extra credit opportunities. Her theme for her assignments are sports and video games. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: Professor Banks is honestly the best. She really cares about the students and is super accessible any time of the day. There are four or five main assignments throughout the semester. All of them are not terribly difficult and she helps a lot with the planning and execution.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Caring
